snippet: In its quest to defend against a hostile takeover, Allergan has pulled back the veil on the usually secretive world of mergers and acquisitions banking, publishing excerpts from emails written by senior Morgan Stanley investment bankers.
abstract: In its quest to defend against a hostile takeover, Allergan has pulled back the veil on the usually secretive world of mergers and acquisitions banking, publishing excerpts from emails written by senior Morgan Stanley investment bankers.

headline.main: In Battle Over Allergan, Morgan Stanley Gets in the Crossfire
